;----------------------------
; Start of FAR Section
;----------------------------
; Start of FAR3 Section (FAR2 below)
; Added by memo on 08/28/2012
; last edited by memo on 09/09/2012
;
; FAR and wide radius road curves stability code
;
; straight FAR continuation
0x5f090000,2,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,2,0,0x5f090000,0,0
0x5f090000,2,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,2,0,0x5f090000,0,0
0x5f090000,0,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,0,1,0x5f090000,2,1
0x5f090000,0,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,0,1,0x5f090000,2,1
0x5f090000,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090000,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090000,2,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
0x5f090000,2,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090100,0,0,0x5f090200,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090100,2,1,0x5f090200,2,1
; prevent from continuing too far
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;
; orthogonal to FAR curve continuation
0x5f090400,0,0,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090400,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090400,2,1,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090400,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
;
; FAR to diagonal curve continuation
0x5f090500,3,0,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090500,3,0,0x5f090600,3,0
0x5f090500,1,1,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090500,1,1,0x5f090600,1,1
0x5f090600,3,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090600,3,0,0x5f090700,3,0
0x5f090600,1,1,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090600,1,1,0x5f090700,1,1
0x5f090600,0,0,0x00000300,0,0=0x5f090600,0,0,0x5f090800,0,0
0x5f090600,2,1,0x00000300,2,0=0x5f090600,2,1,0x5f090800,2,1
0x5f090700,0,0,0x00004b00,0,0=0x5f090700,0,0,0x5f090900,0,0
0x5f090700,0,0,0x00004b00,2,0=0x5f090700,0,0,0x5f090900,0,0
0x5f090700,2,1,0x00004b00,0,0=0x5f090700,2,1,0x5f090900,2,1
0x5f090700,2,1,0x00004b00,2,0=0x5f090700,2,1,0x5f090900,2,1
0x5f090800,2,0,0x00000300,2,0=0x5f090800,2,0,0x5f090600,2,0
0x5f090800,0,1,0x00000300,0,0=0x5f090800,0,1,0x5f090600,0,1
0x5f090600,1,0,0x00000200,2,1=0x5f090600,1,0,0x5f090500,1,0
0x5f090600,3,1,0x00000200,0,0=0x5f090600,3,1,0x5f090500,3,1
0x5f090800,3,0,0x5f090000,0,1=0x5f090800,3,0,0x5f090900,3,0
0x5f090800,1,1,0x5f090000,2,0=0x5f090800,1,1,0x5f090900,1,1
;
; FAR x FAR +-intersection stability (vs roundabout)
0x5f091a00,2,0,0x5f06bb00,0,0=0x5f091a00,2,0,0x5f091800,2,0
0x5f091a00,0,1,0x5f06ba00,2,0=0x5f091a00,0,1,0x5f091800,0,1

; first tile

0x5f592000,3,0,0x5f500200,2,0=0x5f592000,3,0,0x5f591f00,3,0
; stability
0x5f592300,3,0,0x5f500200,2,0=0x5f592300,3,0,0x5f592100,3,0
0x5f592300,1,1,0x5f500200,1,0=0x5f592300,1,1,0x5f592100,1,1
;
; End of Wide radius curves Street Section
;----------------------------
; WRC Avenue section
; Added by Swordmaster 3 Sept 2014
; AVE small 90 degree curve
